headline.main: CIGARETTES ARE ASKED FOR WAR PRISONERS; Group Here Opens Christmas Drive to Aid Frenchmen

abstract: N Y C French Relief Socs Coordinating Council opens Xmas cigarette drive for French in Germany; Mrs C Crosby on number of French in Germany
